description.p: You've put in the effort to expand your magical abilites in the following ways:
Spooky Action at a Distance. When you teleport through someone's space, they take falling damage as force damage rounded down to the nearest 10 feet.

sheet.description: When you teleport through someone's space, they take force damage equal 1d6 per 10 feet traveled, rounded down.

description.p: You've put in the effort to expand your magical abilites in the following ways:
Speed of Light. You gain the Thunder Step, Dimension Door, and Far Step spells as a part of your spell list.
Graviton. Double the damage dice of Planar Warrior.

sheet.description: Double the dice for Planar Warrior's damage.

description.p: You've put in the effort to expand your magical abilites in the following ways:
SPLIT. You can cast Scatter spell twice per Long Rest, applying the Spooky Action to each target's teleport.

sheet.description: You can cast Scatter, applying Spooky Action

description.p: You've put in the effort to expand your magical abilites in the following ways:
And Beyond!. You can cast Teleport and Plane Shift once per Long Rest.

sheet.description: You can cast Teleport and Plane Shift.
